title: Strengthening Patient Care Competencies: Workshop on Developing an Ethical Code for Remote Education Instructors

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can derive core principles for each of the six ethical dimensions of remote education instructors (instructional design, social interaction, content delivery, technology use, management, and assessment)
Learners can develop 62 specific ethical code items by applying the three-stage Delphi technique (dimension evaluation → additional code suggestions → item consensus)
Learners can design actionable guidelines by applying the developed ethical code to actual remote education cases
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
